SOUTHEASTERN TYRRHENIAN SEA.
ITALY.
DNC 09.
TUG URSA MAJOR, 13 PERSONS ON BOARD, ON FIRE
IN 38-31N 015-33E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
